Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs

[Groovy] Interface VfsCopySpec

    • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.VfsCopySpec
    • All Superinterfaces:
      CopySourceSpec

      A copy spec in the spirit of org.gradle.api.file.CopySpec, but specifcally for virtual file systems.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©
      Since:
      1.0

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          VfsCopySpec apply(VfsOptions options)
          Applies an additional set of options to each source within the Spec as well as each child Spec.
          java.lang.Iterable children()
          Allows for iteration of child specs
          VfsURICollection getAllUriCollection()
          Returns a collection of staged or resolved URIs of this spec plus all children specs
          java.lang.String getRelativePath()
          Returns the relative resolved from the initial object in a way that is suitable for appending to a URI
          VfsURICollection getUriCollection()
          Returns a collection of staged or resolved URIs
          VfsCopySpec into(java.lang.Object relativePath)
          Sets a relative path to the root
          VfsCopySpec with(VfsCopySpec... sourceSpecs)
          Adds the given specs as children of this spec

      • Method Detail

        • VfsCopySpec apply(VfsOptions options)

          Applies an additional set of options to each source within the Spec as well as each child Spec. Existing options will NOT be replaced.

          Returns:
          This updated copy spec
          Parameters:
          options - VfsOptions to be applied.

        • java.lang.Iterable children()

          Allows for iteration of child specs

          Returns:
          An iterator for child specs. Never null.

        • VfsURICollection getAllUriCollection()

          Returns a collection of staged or resolved URIs of this spec plus all children specs

          Returns:
          VfsURICollection. Never null.

        • java.lang.String getRelativePath()

          Returns the relative resolved from the initial object in a way that is suitable for appending to a URI

          Returns:
          A string representation. Can be null, if no relative path exists.

        • VfsURICollection getUriCollection()

          Returns a collection of staged or resolved URIs

          Returns:
          VfsURICollection. Never null.

        • VfsCopySpec into(java.lang.Object relativePath)

          Sets a relative path to the root

          Returns:
          This copy spec
          Parameters:
          relativePath - relative to a root of a parent copy spec

        • VfsCopySpec with(VfsCopySpec... sourceSpecs)

          Adds the given specs as children of this spec

          Returns:
          This copy spec.
          Parameters:
          sourceSpecs - The specs to add
